title: Turning the Projector Off
content:
## Quick Steps

1. Click the red **Power Off** button
2. Confirm shutdown if prompted
3. Wait for cool-down period (60-90 seconds)
4. Status Panel will show **Power: Cooling Down**, then **Power: Off**

## Confirmation Dialog

By default, you'll see a confirmation:
- "Are you sure you want to turn off the projector?"
- Click **Yes, Turn Off** to proceed
- Or click **Cancel** to abort
- Check **Don't ask me again** to disable future prompts

## Cooling Down Process

After sending the power-off command:
- The projector fan runs to cool the lamp
- This typically takes **60-90 seconds**
- Status Panel shows estimated time remaining
- Do NOT unplug power during cool-down!

## What Happens

- Application sends power-off command
- Projector begins cool-down cycle
- Status updates automatically
- History Panel shows "Power Off → Success ✓"

> **⚠️ Warning:** Never unplug a projector immediately after turning it off! Always let it cool down completely to protect the expensive lamp.

> **Tip:** If you need a brief pause, use **Blank Screen** instead - it's faster than power off/on.
